title: Ticket #1125: make in condor_tests needlessly recreates symlinks
description:
If you "make" in condor_tests, you'll get a bunch of lines that look like this: 
rm -f job_ckpt_io-buffer-async_std.run
ln -s ../job_ckpt_io-buffer-async_std.run job_ckpt_io-buffer-async_std.run
rm -f job_ckpt_stack_std.run
ln -s ../job_ckpt_stack_std.run job_ckpt_stack_std.run
Even if nothing has changed, it will delete and recreate the symlinks. This is silly and distracting. It should not do so.
